ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: ROFLMAO!  I thought that was what you meant by (guess it didn t work) . Not sure, this guy was gone for over 3 months.  Did you actually destroy all your No
ygData.messageBody:
ROFLMAO! I thought that was what you meant by "(guess it didn't work)".
Not sure, this guy was gone for over 3 months. Did you actually destroy all
your No Drop items before you deleted Shada? If not, then I imagine he
would reappear with everything he had that was No Drop when you deleted him.

Sorry if I opened a can of worms for ya man.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Friday, August 24, 2001 11:01 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....


No I started a character from scratch. I never inquired to the
possibility of restoring Shada. I deleted my no drop items and gave
away all tradeable items. Any details on when the restore would date
back to? Would I be restored at the time I was deleted (0 items) or
sometime before with my no drop items?

God help me, why am I asking?

Shada/Erisi




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
